metadata.title: CVE-2021-47609 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:firmware: arm_scpi: Fix string overflow in SCPI genpd driver Without thebound checks for scpi_pd->name, it could result in the buffer overflow whencopying the SCPI device name from the corresponding device tree node as thename string is set at maximum size of 30. Let us fix it by usingdevm_kasprintf so that the string buffer is allocated dynamically.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
